channel.title: Sections on David Hao Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on David Hao Zhang

item.description: I am a PhD Candidate from Harvard’s Department of Economics and Harvard Business School. I am on the 2021-2022 academic job market. My main area of research is Finance, with special interest in equity and welfare issues in household finance and banking. My secondary fields are Real Estate and Industrial Organization. My CV is available here: CV
* Asterisks indicate presentation by a co-author. Website: This static website was built using Hugo based on code from Gautam Rao.
